text: The 2024 Hama offensive was a military operation launched by forces of the Syrian Salvation Government (SSG) and Turkish-backed rebel groups of the Syrian Interim Government (SIG). This happened during the 2024 Syrian opposition offensive. The operation, which is launched by the Military Operations Command, is taking place in the Hama Governorate. On 5 December 2024, opposition forces took control of Hama. ==References== Category:2024 in Syria Category:December 2024 events
title: 2024 Hama offensive
